verses.kjv: The sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.web: The sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.ct: The sons of Levi were Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.web: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.ct: The sons of Kohath were Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.

verses.kjv: And the children of Amram; Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. The sons also of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
verses.web: The children of Amram: Aaron, Moses, and Miriam. The sons of Aaron: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
verses.ct: The children of Amram were Aaron, Moses, and Miriam. The sons of Aaron were Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

verses.kjv: Eleazar begat Phinehas, Phinehas begat Abishua,
verses.web: Eleazar became the father of Phinehas, Phinehas became the father of Abishua,
verses.ct: Eleazar was the father of Phinehas, and Phinehas was the father of Abishua.

verses.kjv: And Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,
verses.web: Abishua became the father of Bukki. Bukki became the father of Uzzi.
verses.ct: Abishua was the father of Bukki, and Bukki was the father of Uzzi.

verses.kjv: And Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,
verses.web: Uzzi became the father of Zerahiah. Zerahiah became the father of Meraioth.
verses.ct: Uzzi was the father of Zerahiah, and Zerahiah was the father of Meraioth.

verses.kjv: Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
verses.web: Meraioth became the father of Amariah. Amariah became the father of Ahitub.
verses.ct: Meraioth was the father of Amariah, and Amariah was the father of Ahitub.

verses.kjv: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,
verses.web: Ahitub became the father of Zadok. Zadok became the father of Ahimaaz.
verses.ct: Ahitub was the father of Zadok, and Zadok was the father of Ahimaaz.

verses.kjv: And Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
verses.web: Ahimaaz became the father of Azariah. Azariah became the father of Johanan.
verses.ct: Ahimaaz was the father of Azariah, and Azariah was the father of Johanan.

verses.kjv: And Johanan begat Azariah, (he it is that executed the priest’s office in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem:)
verses.web: Johanan became the father of Azariah, who executed the priest’s office in the house that Solomon built in Jerusalem.
verses.ct: Johanan was the father of Azariah — the one who served as priest in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: And Azariah begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
verses.web: Azariah became the father of Amariah. Amariah became the father of Ahitub.
verses.ct: Azariah was the father of Amariah, and Amariah was the father of Ahitub.

verses.kjv: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,
verses.web: Ahitub became the father of Zadok. Zadok became the father of Shallum.
verses.ct: Ahitub was the father of Zadok, and Zadok was the father of Shallum.

verses.kjv: And Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,
verses.web: Shallum became the father of Hilkiah. Hilkiah became the father of Azariah.
verses.ct: Shallum was the father of Hilkiah, and Hilkiah was the father of Azariah.

verses.kjv: And Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak,
verses.web: Azariah became the father of Seraiah. Seraiah became the father of Jehozadak.
verses.ct: Azariah was the father of Seraiah, and Seraiah was the father of Jehozadak.

verses.kjv: And Jehozadak went into captivity, when the LORD carried away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
verses.web: Jehozadak went into captivity, when LORD carried Judah and Jerusalem away by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
verses.ct: Jehozadak was taken into exile when the LORD used Nebuchadnezzar to carry Judah and Jerusalem away as captives.

verses.kjv: The sons of Levi; Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.web: The sons of Levi: Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.ct: The sons of Levi were Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.

verses.kjv: And these be the names of the sons of Gershom; Libni, and Shimei.
verses.web: These are the names of the sons of Gershom: Libni and Shimei.
verses.ct: The sons of Gershom were named Libni and Shimei.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.web: The sons of Kohath were Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.ct: The sons of Kohath were Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.

verses.kjv: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. And these are the families of the Levites according to their fathers.
verses.web: The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. These are the families of the Levites according to their fathers’ households.
verses.ct: The sons of Merari were Mahli and Mushi. These were the clans of the Levites, listed by their ancestral families.

verses.kjv: Of Gershom; Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
verses.web: Of Gershom: Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
verses.ct: From Gershom: his son Libni, then Jahath, then Zimmah,

verses.kjv: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeaterai his son.
verses.web: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, and Jeatherai his son.
verses.ct: then Joah, then Iddo, then Zerah, then Jeaterai.

verses.kjv: The sons of Kohath; Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,
verses.web: The sons of Kohath: Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,
verses.ct: The descendants of Kohath: his son Amminadab, then Korah, then Assir,

verses.kjv: Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,
verses.web: Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, Assir his son,
verses.ct: then Elkanah, then Ebiasaph, then Assir,

verses.kjv: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
verses.web: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
verses.ct: then Tahath, then Uriel, then Uzziah, then Shaul.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.
verses.web: The sons of Elkanah: Amasai and Ahimoth.
verses.ct: The sons of Elkanah were Amasai and Ahimoth.

verses.kjv: As for Elkanah: the sons of Elkanah; Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,
verses.web: As for Elkanah, the sons of Elkanah: Zophai his son, Nahath his son,
verses.ct: As for Elkanah's line: his son Zophai, then Nahath,

verses.kjv: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.
verses.web: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, and Elkanah his son.
verses.ct: then Eliab, then Jeroham, then Elkanah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Samuel; the firstborn Vashni, and Abiah.
verses.web: The sons of Samuel: the firstborn, Joel, and the second, Abijah.
verses.ct: The sons of Samuel were his firstborn Vashni and his second son Abiah.

verses.kjv: The sons of Merari; Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzza his son,
verses.web: The sons of Merari: Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzzah his son,
verses.ct: The descendants of Merari: Mahli, then his son Libni, then Shimei, then Uzza,

verses.kjv: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.
verses.web: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.
verses.ct: then Shimea, then Haggiah, then Asaiah.

verses.kjv: And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the LORD, after that the ark had rest.
verses.web: These are they whom David set over the service of song in LORD’s house, after the ark came to rest there.
verses.ct: These are the men David appointed to lead the music ministry in the house of the LORD after the ark came to rest there.

verses.kjv: And they ministered before the dwelling place of the tabernacle of the congregation with singing, until Solomon had built the house of the LORD in Jerusalem: and then they waited on their office according to their order.
verses.web: They ministered with song before the tabernacle of the Tent of Meeting, until Solomon had built LORD’s house in Jerusalem. They performed the duties of their office according to their order.
verses.ct: They served as singers before the tabernacle — the Tent of Meeting — until Solomon built the house of the LORD in Jerusalem. After that, they carried out their duties according to the order assigned to them.

verses.kjv: And these are they that waited with their children. Of the sons of the Kohathites: Heman a singer, the son of Joel, the son of Shemuel,
verses.web: These are those who served, and their sons. Of the sons of the Kohathites: Heman the singer, the son of Joel, the son of Samuel,
verses.ct: Here are the men who served, along with their sons. From the Kohathites: Heman the singer, who was the son of Joel, the son of Samuel,

verses.kjv: The son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
verses.web: the son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
verses.ct: the son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,

verses.kjv: The son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
verses.web: the son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
verses.ct: the son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,

verses.kjv: The son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
verses.web: the son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
verses.ct: the son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,

verses.kjv: The son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
verses.web: the son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
verses.ct: the son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,

verses.kjv: The son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.
verses.web: the son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.
verses.ct: the son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.

verses.kjv: And his brother Asaph, who stood on his right hand, even Asaph the son of Berachiah, the son of Shimea,
verses.web: His brother Asaph, who stood on his right hand, even Asaph the son of Berechiah, the son of Shimea,
verses.ct: Heman's fellow musician Asaph stood at his right side. Asaph was the son of Berachiah, the son of Shimea,

verses.kjv: The son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchiah,
verses.web: the son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchijah,
verses.ct: the son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchiah,

verses.kjv: The son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,
verses.web: the son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,
verses.ct: the son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,

verses.kjv: The son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
verses.web: the son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
verses.ct: the son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,

verses.kjv: The son of Jahath, the son of Gershom, the son of Levi.
verses.web: the son of Jahath, the son of Gershom, the son of Levi.
verses.ct: the son of Jahath, the son of Gershom, the son of Levi.

verses.kjv: And their brethren the sons of Merari stood on the left hand: Ethan the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,
verses.web: On the left hand their brothers the sons of Merari: Ethan the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,
verses.ct: On the left side stood their fellow Levites from the clan of Merari: Ethan the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,

verses.kjv: The son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,
verses.web: the son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,
verses.ct: the son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,

verses.kjv: The son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,
verses.web: the son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shemer,
verses.ct: the son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,

verses.kjv: The son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.
verses.web: the son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.
verses.ct: the son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.

verses.kjv: Their brethren also the Levites were appointed unto all manner of service of the tabernacle of the house of God.
verses.web: Their brothers the Levites were appointed for all the service of the tabernacle of God’s house.
verses.ct: Their fellow Levites were assigned to handle every other kind of service at the tabernacle, the house of God.

verses.kjv: But Aaron and his sons offered upon the altar of the burnt offering, and on the altar of incense, and were appointed for all the work of the place most holy, and to make an atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
verses.web: But Aaron and his sons offered on the altar of burnt offering, and on the altar of incense, for all the work of the most holy place, and to make atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
verses.ct: But Aaron and his descendants were the ones who made offerings on the altar of burnt offering and the altar of incense. They were responsible for all the work of the Most Holy Place and for making atonement for Israel, following everything that Moses, the servant of God, had commanded.

verses.kjv: And these are the sons of Aaron; Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,
verses.web: These are the sons of Aaron: Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,
verses.ct: These are the descendants of Aaron: his son Eleazar, then Phinehas, then Abishua,

verses.kjv: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
verses.web: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
verses.ct: then Bukki, then Uzzi, then Zerahiah,

verses.kjv: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,
verses.web: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,
verses.ct: then Meraioth, then Amariah, then Ahitub,

verses.kjv: Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.
verses.web: Zadok his son, and Ahimaaz his son.
verses.ct: then Zadok, then Ahimaaz.

verses.kjv: Now these are their dwelling places throughout their castles in their coasts, of the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites: for theirs was the lot.
verses.web: Now these are their dwelling places according to their encampments in their borders: to the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites (for theirs was the first lot),
verses.ct: Here are the territories and settlements assigned to Aaron's descendants from the Kohathite clan, since they received the first allotment by lot.

verses.kjv: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah, and the suburbs thereof round about it.
verses.web: to them they gave Hebron in the land of Judah, and its pasture lands around it;
verses.ct: They were given Hebron in the land of Judah, along with the pasturelands surrounding it.

verses.kjv: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
verses.web: but the fields of the city, and its villages, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
verses.ct: However, the open fields and villages around the city had already been given to Caleb son of Jephunneh.

verses.kjv: And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of Judah, namely, Hebron, the city of refuge, and Libnah with her suburbs, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa, with their suburbs,
verses.web: To the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of refuge, Hebron; Libnah also with its pasture lands, Jattir, Eshtemoa with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: Aaron's descendants received the following cities from the tribe of Judah: Hebron (a city of refuge), Libnah with its pasturelands, Jattir, and Eshtemoa with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Hilen with her suburbs, Debir with her suburbs,
verses.web: Hilen with its pasture lands, Debir with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: Hilen with its pasturelands, Debir with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Ashan with her suburbs, and Bethshemesh with her suburbs:
verses.web: Ashan with its pasture lands, and Beth Shemesh with its pasture lands;
verses.ct: Ashan with its pasturelands, and Beth Shemesh with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Benjamin; Geba with her suburbs, and Alemeth with her suburbs, and Anathoth with her suburbs. All their cities throughout their families were thirteen cities.
verses.web: and out of the tribe of Benjamin, Geba with its pasture lands, Allemeth with its pasture lands, and Anathoth with its pasture lands. All their cities throughout their families were thirteen cities.
verses.ct: From the tribe of Benjamin they received Geba with its pasturelands, Alemeth with its pasturelands, and Anathoth with its pasturelands. In all, their clans received 13 cities.

verses.kjv: And unto the sons of Kohath, which were left of the family of that tribe, were cities given out of the half tribe, namely, out of the half tribe of Manasseh, by lot, ten cities.
verses.web: To the rest of the sons of Kohath were given by lot, out of the family of the tribe, out of the half-tribe, the half of Manasseh, ten cities.
verses.ct: The remaining Kohathite clans received 10 cities by lot from the half-tribe of Manasseh.

verses.kjv: And to the sons of Gershom throughout their families out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
verses.web: To the sons of Gershom, according to their families, out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
verses.ct: The clans of Gershom received 13 cities from the tribes of Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, and the half-tribe of Manasseh in Bashan.

verses.kjv: Unto the sons of Merari were given by lot, throughout their families, out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
verses.web: To the sons of Merari were given by lot, according to their families, out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
verses.ct: The clans of Merari received 12 cities by lot from the tribes of Reuben, Gad, and Zebulun.

verses.kjv: And the children of Israel gave to the Levites these cities with their suburbs.
verses.web: The children of Israel gave to the Levites the cities with their pasture lands.
verses.ct: The people of Israel gave these cities and their pasturelands to the Levites.

verses.kjv: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities, which are called by their names.
verses.web: They gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities which are mentioned by name.
verses.ct: From the tribes of Judah, Simeon, and Benjamin, they assigned by lot the cities listed here by name.

verses.kjv: And the residue of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities of their coasts out of the tribe of Ephraim.
verses.web: Some of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities of their borders out of the tribe of Ephraim.
verses.ct: Some of the Kohathite clans received cities within the territory of the tribe of Ephraim.

verses.kjv: And they gave unto them, of the cities of refuge, Shechem in mount Ephraim with her suburbs; they gave also Gezer with her suburbs,
verses.web: They gave to them the cities of refuge, Shechem in the hill country of Ephraim with its pasture lands, and Gezer with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: They were given Shechem (a city of refuge) in the hill country of Ephraim with its pasturelands, and also Gezer with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Jokmeam with her suburbs, and Bethhoron with her suburbs,
verses.web: Jokmeam with its pasture lands, Beth Horon with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: Jokmeam with its pasturelands, Beth Horon with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Aijalon with her suburbs, and Gathrimmon with her suburbs:
verses.web: Aijalon with its pasture lands, Gath Rimmon with its pasture lands;
verses.ct: Aijalon with its pasturelands, and Gath Rimmon with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh; Aner with her suburbs, and Bileam with her suburbs, for the family of the remnant of the sons of Kohath.
verses.web: and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Aner with its pasture lands, and Bileam with its pasture lands, for the rest of the family of the sons of Kohath.
verses.ct: From the half-tribe of Manasseh, the remaining Kohathite clans received Aner with its pasturelands and Bileam with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: Unto the sons of Gershom were given out of the family of the half tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with her suburbs, and Ashtaroth with her suburbs:
verses.web: To the sons of Gershom were given, out of the family of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with its pasture lands, and Ashtaroth with its pasture lands;
verses.ct: The descendants of Gershom received from the half-tribe of Manasseh: Golan in Bashan with its pasturelands and Ashtaroth with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Issachar; Kedesh with her suburbs, Daberath with her suburbs,
verses.web: and out of the tribe of Issachar, Kedesh with its pasture lands, Daberath with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Issachar they received Kedesh with its pasturelands, Daberath with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Ramoth with her suburbs, and Anem with her suburbs:
verses.web: Ramoth with its pasture lands, and Anem with its pasture lands;
verses.ct: Ramoth with its pasturelands, and Anem with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Asher; Mashal with her suburbs, and Abdon with her suburbs,
verses.web: and out of the tribe of Asher, Mashal with its pasture lands, Abdon with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Asher they received Mashal with its pasturelands, Abdon with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Hukok with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs:
verses.web: Hukok with its pasture lands, and Rehob with its pasture lands;
verses.ct: Hukok with its pasturelands, and Rehob with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Naphtali; Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs, and Hammon with her suburbs, and Kirjathaim with her suburbs.
verses.web: and out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with its pasture lands, Hammon with its pasture lands, and Kiriathaim with its pasture lands.
verses.ct: From the tribe of Naphtali they received Kedesh in Galilee with its pasturelands, Hammon with its pasturelands, and Kirjathaim with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: Unto the rest of the children of Merari were given out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmon with her suburbs, Tabor with her suburbs:
verses.web: To the rest of the Levites, the sons of Merari, were given, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmono with its pasture lands, Tabor with its pasture lands;
verses.ct: The remaining descendants of Merari received from the tribe of Zebulun: Rimmon with its pasturelands and Tabor with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho, on the east side of Jordan, were given them out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with her suburbs, and Jahzah with her suburbs,
verses.web: and beyond the Jordan at Jericho, on the east side of the Jordan, were given them, out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with its pasture lands, and Jahzah with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: Across the Jordan from Jericho, on the river's east side, they received from the tribe of Reuben: Bezer in the wilderness with its pasturelands and Jahzah with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: Kedemoth also with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs:
verses.web: Kedemoth with its pasture lands, and Mephaath with its pasture lands;
verses.ct: Kedemoth with its pasturelands, and Mephaath with its pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Gad; Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs, and Mahanaim with her suburbs,
verses.web: and out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its pasture lands, Mahanaim with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Gad they received Ramoth in Gilead with its pasturelands, Mahanaim with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Heshbon with her suburbs, and Jazer with her suburbs.
verses.web: Heshbon with its pasture lands, and Jazer with its pasture lands.
verses.ct: Heshbon with its pasturelands, and Jazer with its pasturelands.
